Mint new tokens to a specified address.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"txType":{"type":"string","enum":{"type":"string","enum":["token:mint","token:transfer"]},"description":"Type of the token transaction."}},"title":"TokenTransactionBaseParams"},{"type":"object","properties":{"txType":{"type":"string","enum":["token:mint"],"description":"Must be \"token:mint\""}}}],"title":"TokenMintTransactionParams"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
